item.description:
"Howl at the Moon Boston is the hottest party in the Financial District! Our high-energy dueling pianos and amazing events make us the coolest spot for Boston nightlife! From company outings to happy hour with friends to bachelorette parties in Boston, the party's always at Howl at the Moon. Contact the local Boston Howl team for more details about Beantown's hottest dueling piano bar!"

I've been to Howl at the moon before and I had a great time. This place can get packed pretty quickly.I do recommend getting there early, so you will beat the line.

Parking is a bit tricky in the finacial district. You will have to look for a garage or on street parking.

For the MBTA riders, there are multple T stations near by such as South Station, Down Town Crossing, and State Street. The walking time varies from 8 to 10 minutes.

http://www.howlatthemoon.com/locations/location-boston

Â 

Dress Code: It's typically casual to business causal. Some people usually wear thier club clothing, but a very few.

The cover is $10.
item.name: Dueling Pianos, Music, and Drinks
